about_the_game:
Goblin Hotdogs is a cute and casual 3D Puzzle/Platformer, about
  • goblins
  • hotdogs
  • ???

Colorful adventures await!

Goblin Hotdogs is a singleplayer game in which the player plays as a cute goblin who has the goal of collecting hotdogs. The player controls the goblin and collects hotdogs by moving, jumping, sprinting, and toggling between third-person and first-person perspective (with some areas and puzzles being easier to navigate or solve in one perspective or the other). The player will also perform archery to interact with objects in the game.

In its current state, the game is one level containing a tutorial area and a larger open area for the player to explore.

Please check back on this description throughout Early Access, as it will likely be updated to continue to reflect the current state of the game. Features that are planned but not yet implemented are not included within this description. For those, please see the Early Access section.

name: Goblin Hotdogs

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 2070, or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Window 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 2070, or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Goblin Hotdogs is a cute and casual 3D Puzzle/Platformer. Explore, solve the mysteries of the universe, and collect the ultimate prize (hotdogs).
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Korean*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
